name: Leadventure - Digital Dealership Platform & Virtual Showroom
description: Comprehensive product development and maintenance for the market-leading provider of digital solutions for vehicle dealerships, including virtual showroom experiences and modernized distribution center operations.
challenge: Legacy codebase on deprecated technology created maintenance challenges, with limited skills availability and lack of proper knowledge repository. Building new applications that needed to integrate with legacy systems while providing virtual walkaround experiences.
solution: Virtual showroom platform with 360° vehicle visualization directly from mobile
Built 12-member pilot team growing to 30 people in 18 months
Created reusable training materials for 30-year old legacy tech stack
Established knowledge repository within client network
Complete automation of path-to-production for ten workstreams
Infrastructure-as-code implementation for efficient resource utilization

impact.trainingEfficiency: New resources fully trained within 2 weeks
impact.margins: 40% margins through retrained resources and reusable framework
impact.automation: Complete path-to-production automation for all workstreams

outcomes: Delivered modernization exercise for DMS software
Anyone can capture 360° view using mobile app without special equipment
Extended functionality to interior design and other visualization use-cases
Reduced infrastructure spend leading to client commendation
Ensured system uptime SLA adherence and predictability
